thread.title: Multi-million cancer centre gets cash boost
thread.title_full: Multi-million cancer centre gets cash boost | Meridian - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Multi-million cancer centre gets cash boost

organizations.name: feb 2017 health hampshire & isle of wight

text:
A new multi-million-pound cancer research centre in Hampshire has received a further boost.
The Cancer Immunology Centre - being built next to Southampton General Hospital - is the first of its kind in the country. Cancer Research UK has invested more than Â£8m into its existing research facilities there.
Martin Dowse reports on how Southampton has found itself at the forefront of the fight against the disease:
Play video Last updated Fri 3 Feb 2017 Health Hampshire & Isle of Wight
